## useTokenSupply() function

Get the total circulating supply of a token

## Example

```jsx
import { useProgram, useMintToken } from "@web3sdks/react/solana";

export default function Component() {
  const { program } = useProgram("{{program_address}}");
  const { data: totalSupply, isLoading } = useTokenSupply(program);

  return <p>{totalSupply}</p>;
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useTokenSupply(
  program: RequiredParam<Token>,
): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseQueryResult<
  {
    value: string;
    displayValue: string;
  },
  unknown
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                       | Description                            |
| --------- | -------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| program   | RequiredParam&lt;Token&gt; | The token program to get the supply of |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseQueryResult&lt;{ value: string; displayValue: string; }, unknown&gt;
